title: I have a little, but big problem.
body:
I have noticed a MASSIVE amount of bot activity increasing, and it is literally leeching the fun our of the game.. When will you (RIOT) actually start taking action against them? in the form of an IP Ban or something similar.. I have reported multiple Bots, and been partnered with them for days on end after the report, which to me displays that they go unpunished. I have spent lot's of money purchasing various items in game as well as others just to have the experience crushed by others exploiting you're new unlimited lvlng system. 

Please, i BEG you to take immediate action against those "cheats".

Sincerely, 
One Disgruntled Player.
